alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 10:41AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact Flagstaff and areas eastward towards Doney Park through 1115 AM MST... At 1039 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Flagstaff Mall, or near Flagstaff, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, penny size hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Localized flooding is possible. Locations impacted include... Flagstaff, Cosnino, Flagstaff Mall, Winona, Walnut Canyon National Monument, Downtown Flagstaff, Doney Park, Hutchison Acres, Walnut Canyon Visitors Center and Little Elden Spring Horse Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
